author: Rocky
text: I received damaged, worn, scuffed, dirty shoes after buying shoes advertised to be new. I contacted customer service and they offered me $35. I told them that is not sufficient for a purchase of over $300. They falsely advertised and “verified” the sneakers to be new but when I received them it was obvious they were worn, scuffed and visibly dirty. They should’ve sent the shoes back to the seller and/or sold them as used sneakers. I paid money for new shoes as advertised and got used shoes. StockX is truly disappointing and only interested in their commission. No standards, no customer service. If I had a white name I’m sure they would have continued to speak to me after I requested the case be elevated to a manager. However my education is white and so is my lawyer. I will be pursuing this with all review sites, BBB and civil claims court. I’m the right one.
title: Damaged/ dirty/ worn. Customer service ignores my emails!

author: noprofit
text: they take all my profits
title: they take all my profits

author: Raymond
text: The wrong shoes were sent to me and they don’t even know if I will get the shoes I ordered and won’t refund my money
title: The wrong shoes were sent to me

author: Kayla
text: While the whole process receiving the shoes was quick the customer service is severely lacking. The shoes I received were in poor quality. They were dirty, scuffed, already had slight creasing before even trying them on and the leather on one side of the shoe was completely wrinkled and warped. I emailed all photos (with all the flaws clearly visible) and received a quick response saying they would only refund $30 and there would be no exchanges.. but I could resell the shoes. I would not feel comfortable reselling the shoes in their current state knowing how unhappy I was receiving them myself. My replies have unfortunately gone unanswered for the last week. I realize StockX does authentication checks but quality checks should be just as important. These shoes should have never been sent out especially for a resell price and with them being labeled as brand new condition.
title: Scuffed shoes, terrible customer service.

author: OSCAR CASTELLANOS
text: Horrible service if a package gets lost they can’t help you at all. They won’t return your money or bother to even start a claim with fedEx
title: Horrible service if a package gets lost…

author: Ross
text: Ordered shoes, now two weeks later still nothing. Received email telling me they were backed up but I didn’t need to do anything just wait. Ended up ordering the same shoes from goat a week after my StockX order and received them in four days. This will be my first and last order with StockX
title: Ordered shoes
